name: Pitfall II: Lost Caverns
description: Join Pitfall Harry as he searches a vast subterranean cliff dwelling high in the Andes. He’s looking for the fabled Raj Diamond, gold bricks, his niece Rhonda and the cowardly lion Quickclaw. He finds more than he bargained for – eels, poisonous frogs, albino scorpions, bats, condors, a raging river – in the greatest challenge of his career!
